verbs.description: The United Nations [V: is] calling the Trump administration 's ' zero tolerance ' policy on immigration ' illegal , ' adding mounting criticism on the separation of children from their parents at the border .

[ARG0: The United Nations] is [V: calling] [ARG1: the Trump administration 's ' zero tolerance ' policy on immigration] [ARG2: ' illegal] , ' [ARGM-ADV: adding mounting criticism on the separation of children from their parents at the border] .
